data.text: @ParulChandoliy @PMOIndia @whoccnm @DghsIndia @PHMglobal @ICNurses Does this hospital has enough nurses as per SIU norms?

@iaph2030 @PMOIndia @whoccnm @DghsIndia @PHMglobal @ICNurses Its really sad that we the contractual nurses of dr ram manohar lohia hospital have received termination letters.. even after performing our duties with utmost dedication and being frontline warriors during covid times we are getting terminated from our jobs. Pls support us 🙏
@iaph2030 @PMOIndia @whoccnm @DghsIndia @PHMglobal @ICNurses What could be more nonsense than this

@iaph2030 @PMOIndia @whoccnm @DghsIndia @PHMglobal @ICNurses Very sad...and this is the true face of policy makers..one side they appreciate and other side they back stab...it is very very essential that nursing proffessional should have say in policy making independence or face such exploitation for perpetually..
